text: @realDonaldTrump Oh ok.  Let me get this straight. He lied. He admitted to it. And then the FBI, whose hand-picked head who is only there because you fired the previous head, “lost“ the records. Did I get that right?  If I believed that I would also believe you tested negative for coronavirus.
